lead_paragraph: News of two deals in the energy sector helped the market, while Iran’s oil minister said his country would support an OPEC effort to stabilize oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Optimism About an Oil Industry Rebound Lifts Shares
headline.main: Optimism About an Oil Industry Rebound Lifts Shares

snippet: News of two deals in the energy sector helped the market, while Iran’s oil minister said his country would support an OPEC effort to stabilize oil prices....
abstract: Stocks ascend as energy shares rise on oil industry optimism.
